attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My husbands teeth are breaking off and rotting in his mouth.

NHS directive says that we will only  have an HNS dentist in another 6 months.

 Tony Blare can tell the troops to go to Afganistan and  Iraq but can't tell the dentists to fix teeth on the Nation Health. 

So Queen Elizabeth . Please help.

God Bless,
Pauline.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
